headline: VeriSign's Strong Q3 Results and Dividends Might Change The Case For Investing In VRSN
summary: VeriSign reported third quarter earnings with sales of US$419.1 million and net income of US$212.8 million, surpassing results from the prior year, and declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.77 per share payable in late November 2025. The company continued its substantial share repurchase activity and saw improvement in new domain registrations and renewal rates, indicating strengthened demand for its core domain name services. With third quarter revenue and net income exceeding expectations,...
